xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfSingleSegment: Segments disclosed in Consolidated Financial Results
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: “Since the format of Cash Flow Statement in XBRL results utility differs from the signed quick results submitted by the Company with Stock Exchanges on May 16, 2023, the reporting of figures in the Cash Flow Statement has been made in line with the quick financial results. Therefore, following re-classification has been made: 1. ‘Adjustments for provisions, current’ to be read as ‘Adjustments for provisions, current & non-current’ 2. ‘Adjustments for other financial liabilities, current’ to be read as ‘Adjustments for other financial & non-financial liabilities, current & non-current’ 3. ‘Adjustments for other financial assets, current’ to be read as ‘Adjustments for other financial & non-financial assets, current & non-current’ 4. ‘Other cash payments to acquire interests in joint ventures’ to be read as ‘Investment in subsidiaries, associates and joint venture’
